nodes.name: UFragmentsPolicy

nodes.documentation:
@notice Initiates a new rebase operation, provided the minimum time period has elapsed.

     * @dev The supply adjustment equals (_totalSupply * DeviationFromTargetRate) / rebaseLag
     Where DeviationFromTargetRate is (MarketOracleRate - targetRate) / targetRate
     and targetRate is 0.006
nodes.name: rebase

nodes.documentation:
@notice Sets the reference to the YFI oracle.
@param yfiOracle_ The address of the YFI oracle contract.
nodes.name: setYFIOracle

nodes.documentation:
@notice Sets the reference to the market oracle.
@param tokenOracle_ The address of the market oracle contract.
nodes.name: setTokenOracle

nodes.documentation:
@notice Sets the reference to the orchestrator.
@param orchestrator_ The address of the orchestrator contract.
nodes.name: setOrchestrator
setDeviationThreshold
setRebaseLag
setRebaseTimingParameters
initialize

nodes.documentation:
@return If the latest block timestamp is within the rebase time window it, returns true.
        Otherwise, returns false.
nodes.name: inRebaseWindow

nodes.documentation:
@return Computes the total supply adjustment in response to the exchange rate
        and the targetRate.
nodes.name: computeSupplyDelta
withinDeviationThreshold
